sch_id = #{schId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update base_student set sch_id = #{schId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stu_no = #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_nickname = #{stuNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, stu_enrl_year = #{stuEnrlYear,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, stu_icon = #{stuIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_dt = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_dt = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count( id ) FROM base_student WHERE stu_enrl_year = #{classYear,jdbcType=SMALLINT} AND STATUS =0
